remarks: Define the outer Lebesgue measure for subsets of the reals.  Here ` f ` is a function from the positive integers to pairs ` <. a , b >. ` with ` a <_ b ` , and the outer volume of the set ` x ` is the infimum over all such functions such that the union of the open intervals ` ( a , b ) ` covers ` x ` of the sum of ` b - a ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)
